projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: My first project for Learning People's course. The project aims to showcase my knowledge and ability to build a static portfolio website as required. Bootstrap is used to help with the layout and mobile responsiveness. Features navigation, about, skills, portfolio and contact sections.

projects.title: GeoQuiz
projects.description: The GeoQuiz game is my second project with Learning People. The project aims to showcase my knowledge and ability to build a JavaScript interactive website. Features navigation, about, how to play and a quiz section. The quiz section contains questions, time and score trackers. There are sounds for correct and incorrect answers. After the completion of the quiz, a summary report is displayed.

projects.title: Sneakers
projects.description: Third project with Learning People. E-commerce website Sneakers. The project aims to showcase my knowledge and ability to build a React app. The website features navigation with links, cart and user image, lightbox gallery, buttons for the number of pairs, add to cart button and a checkout modal with a delete option.
